# Hanali Celanil
## Overview
Name: Hanali Celanil

Gender: f

Rank: Intermediate Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Love, Romance, Beauty, Fine Arts, Artists

Titles: The Heart of Gold, Winsome Rose, Archer of Love, Kiss of Romance, Lady Goldheart

Holy Symbol: Heart of gold

Alignment: CG

Origin of Worship: Elf

Core Worshippers: Elves

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Dagger

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: *+1 defending dagger*

Domains: Chaos, Community\* (CD), Domination\* (CD), Good, Magic, Nobility\* (CW, Ss), Protection.

Special Notes:
